title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Enterprise software licensing and optimization on AWS (MAM315)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 上的企业软件许可和优化 (MAM315)
abstract: This breakout session dives into licensing commercial software on AWS, with a focus on Microsoft workloads. Join our Microsoft Optimization and Licensing Assessment (OLA) specialists to explore the best practices for navigating licensing complexities in the cloud while maximizing cost-efficiency. Learn about fully-funded OLA offerings for on-premises workloads, cloud to AWS migrations, existing EC2 deployments, and the new self-serve AWS Transform Assessments. Discover how these assessments provide valuable insights and right-sizing recommendations across multiple services such as Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2).
abstract_cn: 本分组会议深入探讨在 AWS 上许可商业软件的问题，重点关注 Microsoft 工作负载。加入我们的 Microsoft 优化和许可评估 (OLA) 专家，探索在云中应对许可复杂性的最佳实践，同时最大化成本效益。了解针对本地工作负载、云到 AWS 迁移、现有 EC2 部署以及新的自助式 AWS Transform Assessments 的全额资助 OLA 产品。探索这些评估如何在 Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) 等多个服务中提供有价值的洞察和合理调整建议。
